evidence_in_case: Immediate: ARDS, Ventricular arrhythmias, Cardiogenic shock, Cardiac arrest, Respiratory failure, Hypoxic respiratory failure (generic ICU complications)
Early: MODS, DIC, Pneumonia, Pleural effusion, Pneumothorax (not endocarditis-specific)
Late: Pulmonary fibrosis, Chronic respiratory insufficiency (not endocarditis-specific)
findings.universal_impact: Affects ALL cases (generic ICU complications appear in non-ICU cases)
findings.expected_for_endocarditis: Valve perforation, perivalvular abscess, embolic events (stroke/splenic/renal infarcts), conduction abnormalities, glomerulonephritis
